General.Name: Logan Group Company Limited
General.Description: Logan Group Company Limited, an investment holding company, operates as an property developer in the People's Republic of China. It operates through four segments: Property Development, Development Management, Urban Redevelopment, and Property Operation. The Property Development segment develops and sells residential and commercial properties, retail shops, and office units; and sells land held for development. The Development Management segment constructs office premises and residential buildings; and provides decoration services to external customers and interior decoration services to property buyers. The Urban Redevelopment Business segment sells land and properties for urban redevelopment. The Property Operation segment leases office units, commercial centers, retail shops, and hotels. Logan Group Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. The company operates as a subsidiary of Junxi Investments Limited.

5.Name: Ms. Yan Wing  Li FCIS, FCS(PE)
